Carlos, 37, is married and has two children.   He lives with his wife and children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía belonging to Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is involved with short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.

Carlos grows corn.  His purchases and sales take place in Ventanas.  He requests the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and urea and to lease more farmland.  The challenge he faces is plant infestations.  His dream is to be able to buy land.  He likes playing volleyball in his free time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, urea and to lease farmland.

loans.name: Orly Geovanny

texts.es:
ORLY GEOVANNY tiene 30 años de estado civil Union Libre vive con la compañera y con los hijos. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La Ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

ORLY GEOVANNY se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz, fréjol, ademas se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, pollos. Compra y vende los productos en Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para comprar lo necesario para la siembras. El sueño es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando.

En elt iempo libre le gusta parcticar los deportes.
texts.en:
Orly Geovanny, 30, is in a civil union and lives with his spouse and children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “14 de Diciembre” communal bank that has 15 members from Cooperative San José.  It’s located in Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas belonging to Ventanas Canton.  They are in agricultural activities like planting corn.

Orly Geovanny grows corn and broad beans and also raises pigs and chickens.  He buys and sells products in Ventanas.  He requested the loan to buy manure, urea, and liquid fertilizer for his corn crops.  The loan will help him buy what he needs for the crops.  His dream is to buy a lot to continue planting.  He likes to play sports in his free time.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Genisa

texts.en:
Genisa of Trinidad, Bohol has had a farming business since 2009. She is 29 years old, married, and has three children ages 2, 8 and 11. Genisa and her husband rely on rice farming both for income and consumption.

Genisa is requesting a loan to pay for fertilizer, pesticides and farm labor. Her income will go into savings for future needs including school fees and maintaining the healthy diet of her children. In the future, she hopes to expand the land that she can till and increase the variety of crops grown to produce a better profit.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, pesticides and labor.

loans.name: Renante

texts.en: Renante is 30 years old and from the town of Trinidad, Bohol. He is married with four children ages 3, 5, 7 and 8. Renante operates a sari-sari store and farms rice. He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, seedlings and hired labor. The loan means a lot to Renante since he does not have access to bank loans. He is optimistic that everything will pay off through a good harvest. In the future, he would like to have more farmland to cultivate for a better income. This way, he can better provide for his family's needs, especially for his young children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seedlings and hired labor.

loans.name: Milton David

texts.es:
Milton  tiene 28 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Milton se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandúl. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insumos, líquidos , urea, abonos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los abonos sin ningún tipo de problema porque contara con el dinero del crédito.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas de la alangosta en los cultivos.

el sueño es poder comprar una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta paracticar el deporte.
texts.en:
Milton, 28, is married and has two children.  He lives with his wife and children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía that’s part of Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is involved in agricultural activities related to short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.

Milton grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  His purchases and sales take place in Ventanas.  He requests the loan to buy fertilizer, supplies, liquids, urea and manure.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy manure problem-free because he’ll have the money from the loan.

The challenge he faces is plant infestations in his crops.  His dream is to buy a house and he enjoys playing sports in his free time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, farming supplies, liquid nutrients, urea, and compost.

loans.name: Luis Humberto

texts.es:
Luis Humberto tiene 21 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para los sembríos de maíz.Con la ayuda del crédito podra mejorar el estilo de vida y mejorar los ingresos.

Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas. El sueño es poder tener una finca. En el tiempo libre le guta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Luis Humberto, 21, is single and has no children.  He lives with his parents in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía belonging to Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank carries out agricultural activities related to short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.

Luis grows corn.  His purchases and sales take place in Ventanas.  He’s asking for the loan to buy supplies, fertilizer, urea and liquids for his corn crops.  With help from the loan he will be able to improve his lifestyle and his income.  He faces challenges like plant infestations and his dream is to own a farm.  He enjoys playing volleyball in his free time.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fertilizers, urea, and liquids for his corn fields

loans.name: Victor Santiago

texts.es:
VICTOR SANTIAGO tiene 64 años de estado civil Soltero vive tiene 4 hijos pero no viven con el. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

VICTOR SANTIAGO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz, plátano, cacao, arroz,fréjol. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar y en las ferias de los alrededores.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. El sueño es comprar un terreno para construir una casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta ver la television.
texts.en:
Victor Santiago is 64 years old and single. He has four children, but they don't live with him. He lives in Ventanas canton in De los Ríos province. 

The "14 of December" communal bank is made up of 15 members of Cooperativa San José, and is located in the San Vicente area of Las Lomas, in Ventanas canton. The members engage in farming, such as growing corn. 

Victor Santiago is a farmer and grows corn, plantains, cacao, rice and beans. He buys his products in Ventanas, and sells his produce in the market of the same place and in markets in the surrounding area. 

He applied for the loan to buy seeds, manure, urea, and liquid fertilizers for growing corn. The loan has helped him increase the family's income. His dream is to buy a piece of land for building a home. 

In his free time, he likes to watch television.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure, urea, and liquid fertilizers for growing corn.

loans.name: Candelario

texts.es:
Don Candelario originario de la comunidad Potrerillo, es una comunidad en las afueras de Teustepe, casado, tiene 5 hijos ellos estudian su secundaria en un instituto de la localidad. El se dedica a la siembra de maíz,  frijol y trigo desde los 18 años lo cual hacía con poco dinero, como segundo ingreso compraba y vendía cerdos y también era jornalero, con el tiempo obtuvo un crédito en una microfinanciera, lo utilizo para comprar toros de engorde, le fue le muy bien. Hoy en día tiene ganado de además de seguir dedicándose ala siembra de maíz, trigo y frijol que lo lleva a comercializar al mercado de la localidad donde también vende su ganado, la leche y cuajadas que le producen sus vacas.
Él dice que le gustaría vender el ganado de repasto en uno de los mercados de la capital ya que se lo pagarían bien, este año desea aumentar el área de siembra para lograr  más cosecha. Él está solicitando un crédito Kiva para comprar dos toros para engordarlos y venderlos en un  mejor precio.
texts.en:
Don Candelario is from the community of Potrerillo, which is on the outskirts of Teustepe.  He is married and has five children who are all studying at a local high school.

He has grown corn, beans and wheat since he was 18 years old, and has not made much income in this activity.  As a second source of income he began buying and selling pigs, and he also use to be a day laborer.  Eventually he obtained a loan through a microfinance insitution, which he used for the purchase of calves for fattening, and this went very well.

Currently he has livestock and also continues to grow his corn, beans and wheat.  He takes these crops to the local market to sell them, along with his livestock and the milk and curd that his cows produce.

He says that he would like to sell his dairy cows in one of the markets in the capital, since he would be able to get a good price.  This year he wants to expand his planting area so that he can get a larger harvest.  He is seeking this Kiva loan in order to but two calves so that he can fatten them and sell them at a good price.

loans.use: to buy two calves.

loans.name: Bonifacio

texts.en: Bonifacio is a 60-year-old fisherman from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. He supports his two children, ages 14 and 18. Bonifacio is asking for a loan to buy a fish net, gasoline, fish hooks and new clothes. Bonifacio hopes that his fishing business will thrive because this is the only livelihood that he knows well. His income will go towards his family's daily expenses and school fees.

loans.use: to buy a fish net, gasoline, fish hooks and new clothes.

loans.name: Gorgonia

texts.en: Gorgonia is from the community of Bien Unido in the province of Bohol. She is 57 years old and has been a rice farmer for 26 years. She has three children, ages 14, 22 and 24. Gorgoni is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, herbicide and pesticides that she can use on her farm. She would like to maintain and improve her farm, because this brings profit and food for her family. With this loan, she expects a good harvest and an increase in her business' profitability. The additional income will go towards her family's daily expenses and possible new business opportunities.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide and pesticide.

loans.name: Roque

texts.en:
Roque is 32 years old from the town of San Miguel in Bohol. He is married with two children, ages six and eight. He provides transportation services with his motorcycle, locally known as a habal-habal. He is asking for a loan to buy spare tires and pay for the vulcanizing fee of his motorcyle.

He is a tenacious man and hopes to someday improve the life of his family through his hard work. His income will go towards his family's daily expenses and school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy spare tires and pay for vulcanizing fee.

loans.name: Reynalda

texts.en:
From the town of San Miguel in Bohol, 35-year-old Reynalda started her farming business when she got married. She grows rice both for consumption and profit, her income providing for the needs of her five children, who range in age from 13 to 4 years old.

With this loan, Reynalda plans to buy fertilizer, insecticide, pesticides and seedlings. The additional income will go toward her family's daily consumption, school fees and reinvestment in her farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, pesticides and seedlings.

loans.name: Victor Julio

texts.es:
VICTOR  tiene 24 años de edad de  casado tine un hijo, vive con la esposa y con el hijo de 4 años de edad en Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Victor se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas como la langosta y el raton.

Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, urea, abonos, líquidos para la maleza. con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar el nivel de vida para poder trabajar.

El sueño es poder comprar una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Víctor, 24, is married and has a son.  He lives with his wife and four-year-old son in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía that’s part of Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is involved in agricultural activities related to short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.

Víctor works farming corn.  His purchases and sales take place in Ventanas.  Challenges he faces are plant infestations.  He’s asking for a loan to buy supplies, urea, manure and liquid to kill weeds.  With help from the loan he’ll be able to improve his standard of living to be able to work.

His dream is to be able to buy a house and he enjoys playing sports in his free time.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, urea, compost, and liquid treatments for weeds.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es: Ernestina de 52 años de edad, es viuda con tres hijos de 24 ,22,16 años tiene una  pulpería, la cual consiste en un pequeña tienda donde se venden productos en pequeñas cantidades por ejemplo cigarros por unidad, azúcar y arroz por libra, shampoo en bolsitas . Su pulpería está ubicada en su casa de habitación donde vende a los vecinos productos de consumo diario como: golosinas, granos básicos. El negocio lo inicio siete años atrás a raíz que su difunto esposo se enfermo de gravedad. Lo inicio con fondos propios con el objetivo de mejorar los ingresos del hogar  y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos médicos. El financiamiento lo quiere para invertir en el negocio para mejorar su capital de trabajo y ampliar el negocio  y de igual forma podría mejorar sus ingresos económicos, y mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Ernestina, 52, is a widow with three children whose ages are 24, 22 and 16 years.  She has a grocery store which is a small store that sells in small quantities.  For example, cigarettes by the unit, rice and sugar by the pound, shampoo in little bags.  Her grocery store is located in her house and she sells daily consumption goods like snacks and basic grains to her neighbors.  

She started the business seven years ago when her late husband became gravely ill.  She started it with her own funds aiming at improving household income and help with her husband’s medical expenses.  She wants the loan to invest in her business to improve her working capital and expand the business to improve her income and her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Angelica Isabel

texts.es:
Angelica Isabel tiene 32 años de estado civil casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

Angelica Isabel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz, arroz y fréjol. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes. El préstamo le ayudará para comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. enfrentan desafios como las plgas el cogollero, langosta. El sueño es comprar terrenos.

En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte y ver la television.
texts.en: Angelica Isabel is 32 years old and in a common-law marriage. She lives with her spouse and two children. She lives in Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos. The "14 de Diciembre" communal bank is made up of fifteen members of Cooperativa San José. It is located in the precinct of San Vicente de Las Lomas, which is in Ventanas Canton. They do agricultural work, such as growing corn. Angelica Isabel works in farming, growing corn, rice, and beans. She buys her products in Ventanas and sells in the market there. The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds, compost, urea, and liquid fertilizer. This loan will help her to buy what she needs for farming. They are facing challenges like army worm and locust infestations. Angelica Isabel's dream is to buy land. In her free time, she likes to play sports and watch television.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, urea, and liquid fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy used clothes for her son's used clothing business

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche,la socia tambien vende lechon con tamal que es un plato a base de chancho,ella prepara platos como matrimonios,bautizos y cumpleaños,la socia ya tiene 30 años en estos negocios,el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y galletas y tambien para comprar carne de chancho al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This communal bank member continues to work in her grocery store business. She sells basic products such as rice, sugar, and milk. She also sells "lechon con tamal" (pork tamales). She prepares food for weddings, baptisms, and birthdays. She has had these businesses for 30 years. Her dream is to have a restaurant. She is applying for the loan to buy basic products such as rice, sugar, milk, and crackers and also to buy pork wholesale.

She is happy to have the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy basic products such as rice, sugar, milk, and crackers, and also to buy pork wholesale

loans.name: Marisol July

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vene productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y golosinas,la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 14 años en este negocio de tienda de abarrotes,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y aceite al por mayor.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues dedicating herself to her grocery store business, where she sells basic stables such as rice, sugar, milk and sweets. The member sells from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m. The member has spent 14 years running this business. Her dream is to expand her grocery store. The member is requesting a loan to purchase rice, sugar, milk and oil, wholesale.

The member is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and oil wholesale.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
La socia se dedica al negocio de venta de sandalias y zapatos, la socia tiene un puesto donde vende las sandalias y zapatos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m. la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio, en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta salir a pasear y distraerse, el sueño de la socia es tener un local más amplio donde pueda vende las babuchas y zapatos, la socia también ahora está vendiendo ropa como pantalones, blusas y chompas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar sandalias y babuchas y también polos, pantalones y blusas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Her business is selling sandals and shoes.  She has a stand where she sells sandals and shoes.  She works from 8am until 4pm and has been in business for four years.  In her free time she likes to go out on excursions to distract herself a bit.  Her dream is to have a more spacious locale to sell scarves and shoes.  She's also selling clothes like pants, blouses and sweaters now.  She’s requesting the loan to buy sandals and scarves as well as t-shirts, pants and blouse.  She’s happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy sandals and scarves.

loans.name: Milenka Teresa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”MARIA ELENA MOYANO“;  La socia Milenka Teresa tiene  33 años de edad ,02 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en una empresa privada, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir brindando una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

La socia sale en la foto con su hija.

La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar los estudios de sus hijos.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "Maria Elena Moyano.“  Her name is Milenka Teresa, she is 33 years old, has 2 children and is married.  She alternates her daily activities with working for a private company.  She has been in her position for quite a while and it has been going well for her, thanks to the effort she puts into her work each day.  Milenka Teresa is a responsible and hard-working person, and so she is able to move her family forward.  She hopes to continue working in order to offer her family a better quality of life. 

Milenka Teresa appears in the above photo with her daughter. 

She is requesting the loan to pay for her children's education.

Milenka Teresa is happy about the loan, and she promises to comply with her re-payment schedule.

loans.use: to pay for her children's education.

loans.name: Gs Cedeño 4 Group

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 37 años, vive en la zona sur de Honduras, junto con el vive sus dos hijos y su esposa quien lo respalda en cada uno de sus compromisos, El trabajo que realiza desde hace 20 años en su comunidad donde vive. Su negocio lo hace de manera ambulante y también en su casa de habitación, ya que tiene clientes los cuales visitan su casa y a otros que se los entrega en sus respectivos negocios.
Don José el crédito lo necesita para la compra de: curiles, pescado y trasmayo de pescar. El impacto esperado con el crédito, es que sus ventas crezcan en gran manera, ya que comprara bastante producto para satisfacer cada uno de los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes, ya que por la calidad de sus productos tiene mucha demanda.
Los planes a futuro de Don José es seguir creciendo en su negocio propio, como también generarse mejores ingresos para darle una mejor educación a sus hijos de igual manera tener una mejor calidad de vida. 
Olivia y María se dedican tiempo completo a su negocio de venta de Mariscos ya que es su fuente de ingresos.
Choluteca, Honduras - Julio del 2012
texts.en:
José, 37, lives in south Honduras with his two children and his wife who backs him up in all his commitments.  He’s been working in his community for 20 years.  He works from place to place and also from home since he has customers that visit him at home and others he delivers to at their respective places of business.

José needs the loan to buy clams, fish and a drag-net to fish.  He expected effect from the loan is that his sales will grow considerably since he will buy enough products to fill each one of his customer orders because he has much demand due to the quality of his products.

José’s future plan is to continue growing in his own business as well as to generate higher income to provide a better education for his children and also to have a better quality of life.  

Olivia and María work full-time in their seafood business which is their source of income.

Choluteca, Honduras - July, 2012

loans.use: to buy clams, fish and a drag-net.

loans.name: Samuel Antonio

texts.es: Samuel Antonio con 48 años casado con un hijo de 12 años que depende económicamente de él. tiene por actividad económica la venta de mercadería en general, desde hace 8 años, la cual distribuye de forma ambulante , en Nicaragua las personas que vende de forma ambulantes son persona con muy pocos recursos económicos que los comerciantes con un lugar fijo. El vende a clientes fijos y eventuales, a los cuales le ofrece créditos  y hace su recuperación de forma quincenal. Samuel lo inicio con dinero propio y aprendió su negocio a través de un familiar el cual se desempeñaba en lo mismo. En la foto Samuel aparece con un bolso donde lleva su mercadería a ofrecer a sus clientes. También tiene un negocio de video juegos ubicado en su casa de habitación.En el cual tiene 18 años de experiencia el ha demostrado que es una persona muy trabajador y emprendedor. Su sueño es incrementar sus negocios y hacer mejoras a su casa, y ofrecer mejores condiciones de vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
Samuel Antonio is 48, married, with one 12-year-old son who depends on him financially. For eight years, the work he has been doing is selling general merchandise door-to-door. In Nicaragua, the people who sell door-to-door are persons with very little in the way of financial resources, compared to merchants that have a permanent location.

He sells to regular and casual customers, to whom he extends credit, and makes his collections every two weeks. 

Samuel started out with his own money, and learned his business through a family member who carried on the same type of work. Samuel appears in the photo, with a bag that he uses to carry his merchandise to sell to his customers. 

He also has a video game business located in his home, a business where he has 18 years of experience. He has shown himself to be a very hard-working and enterprising person. His dream is to see his businesses grow, do improvements to his house, and provide better living conditions for his son.

loans.use: To invest in his business and stock his merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Nageena's Group

texts.en:
Nageena is 47 years old and mother of two sons and a daughter, living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is very hard-working and an independent woman. By stitching clothes, she helps her husband to meet the family needs and her children's education expenses. 

As a member of this two-person lending group, Nageena has requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan for purchasing a sewing machine for the expansion of her business. She has been operating her business very efficiently and honestly for the past three years and her clients always appreciate her work. Nageena is hopeful about her business success as a result of the loan investment.

loans.use: To purchase a new sewing machine for her business.

loans.name: Mukadas

texts.ru: Мукадасу 36 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Мукадас окончила Политехнический Институт. Она модельер-технолог и занимается пошивом женской одежды. Ее муж преподает в университете. Они живут очень дружно, но их доход не позволяет им оплатить за учебу детей. Их старшая дочь Мунира окончила частную школу и поступила в Таджикский Государственный Университет Коммерции. В школе она училась отлично, а также обучилась в компьютерных курсах и имеет 5 сертификатов. Мукадас запрашивает кредит на сумму 800 долларов США для оплаты учебы Муниры в университете. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mukadas is 36 years old, married and raising three children.  She graduated from the Polytechnic Institute.  She is a designer-technologist and is involved in sewing women's clothing.  Her husband teaches at a university.  They live very friendly together, but their income does not allow them to pay for their children's education.  Their oldest daughter, Munira, graduated from a private school and was accepted to the Tajikistan State Commerce University.  She was an excellent student in school and also took computer classes and has five certificates.  Mukadas is requesting a loan in the amount of $800 to pay for Munira's education at the university.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's education at the university

loans.name: Asiya

texts.ru: Асие 26 лет, растит двух детей, младшему сыну 6 месяцев.  Асия работает преподавателем в местной школе и в качестве дополнительного источника дохода для семьи с 2011 года занимается откормом и разведением скота.  На сегодня в хозяйстве Асии имеется одна дойная корова с приплодом, что позволяет иметь около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асия обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы Асия планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Asiya is 26 years old and raising two children, the youngest of whom is six months old.  She works as a teacher at a local school and, to provide an additional source of income for her family, has been involved in fattening up and breeding livestock since 2011.  Today Asiya's business contains one dairy cow with offspring, which allows her to earn about 5,000 som (KGS) per month from sale of milk products.  In order to further develop her business, Asiya requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy sheep for fattening up and resale.  She plans to invest the earnings into a continued business growth.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Idimo

texts.ru: Идимо родилась 1966 году в районе Кумсангир. Ей 44 года. Она замужем. Идимо вместе с мужем занимается растениеводством. Она имеет среднее образование. Идимо в основном выращивает овощи. Она берет кредит для закупа семян лука и минеральных удобрений. Идимо хочет посеять и получить хороший урожай лука.
texts.en: Idimo was born in 1966 in the Qumsangir district.  She is 44 years old and married.  Idimo and her husband are involved in agriculture.  She has a secondary education.  Idimo primarily grows vegetables.  She is requesting this loan to purchase onion seeds and mineral fertilizers.  Idimo wants to plant onions and get a good harvest.

loans.use: to purchase onion seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Marlene Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marlene es originaria de la capital Managua, de 61 años de edad, viuda tiene un hijo, ella es comerciante propietaria de una pulpería que inicio desde que su esposo falleció, empezó vendiendo, helados y frijoles.  Con el tiempo sus clientes le demandaban productos lácteos al ver ella que el negocio iba aumentando decidió invertir en productos mas solicitados por sus clientes ya que ella asegura que los clientes son importantes porque son quienes le ayudan a aumentar el negocio hoy en día tiene una pulpería que lleva aproximadamente 4 años ½ de atenderlo en su casa de habitación, en su negocio le ayudan su hijo y su nuera , también económicamente recibe  el apoyo que le brinda la pensión por viudez.las expectativas que tiene es extender su negocio y abarcar mas clientes de los alrededores y de tener una pequeña pulpería hacer de su negocio una miscelánea.
Marlene ha solicitado este préstamo para compra de productos tales como granos básicos, golosinas, lácteos, verduras, aceite, productos de limpieza y todo lo necesario para vender y surtir su negocio, ella dice que el crédito le ayudara porque ofrecerá mas productos a los clientes y su negocio crecerá poco a poco. Espera que su negocio siga estable y futuramente abrir una distribuidora y abastecer más en el sector donde habita y de esta manera generar más ingresos.
texts.en:
Marlene, 61, is from the capital, Managua.  She’s a widow and has a son.  She’s a merchant; she owns a grocery store that she opened when her husband died.  

She started out selling frozen treats and beans.  In time, her customers requested dairy products and when she saw that business was increasing she decided to invest in the products her customers requested the most. She vows that her customers are the most important because they are the ones that help her increase business and today she has a grocery store that’s been in operation for about four and a half years.  It’s located in her house and her son and daughter-in-law help her in it.  She also gets some economic support from her widow’s pension.  She hopes to extend the business and acquire more customers from the surrounding area and turn her small grocery store into a variety store.

Marlene has requested this loan to buy products like basic grains, snacks, dairy products, vegetables, oil, cleaning supplies and everything necessary to sell and stock her store.  She says that the loan will help her because she will have more products to offer customers and the business will grow little by little.  She hopes the business will maintain its stability and in the future open a warehouse to supply more in the sector where she lives thus generating more income.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Syeda's Group

texts.en:
Syeda is 57 years old and a hard-working married woman living in Punjab, Pakistan with her five sons and two daughters. Since 2005, her husband  has been running his vegetable shop, which is the only source of income for their family. Syeda as a member of this two-person lending group, has requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband's  vegetable shop. 

With the loan investment her husband will buy vegetables of different varieties that will allow him to offer more variety to his clients and increase his sales and income.

Syeda is very hard-working and honest woman and is confident about her family’s bright future.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables for her husband's shop.

loans.name: Kishwar's Group

texts.en:
Kishwar is a 55-year-old married woman with a large family, consisting of her husband, seven daughters and two sons. She is a resident of Punjab, Pakistan. Her husband earns his livelihood by fitting floor tiles and has done so for the last 18 years. He is very hard-working and dedicated to his job. However, his income is constrained due to the unavailability of a tile-cutting machine. 

Kishwar, as a member of a two-person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase a tile-cutting machine for her husband's business. She is hopeful that the loan will bring a positive change to their monthly income and help her in providing a better life and education to her children.

loans.use: To purchase a new tile-cutting machine for her husband's business.

loans.name: Syeda's Group

texts.en:
Syeda is 27 years old, mother of a son and two daughters, and living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a very hard-working and independent woman. By stitching clothes she helps her husband to meet the family expenses. 

Syeda has applied for a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan for purchasing a sewing machine to make more products to sell and to further improve her business. She has been operating her business very efficiently and honestly for the past eight years. 

Syeda is hopeful about her business success as a result of the loan investment.

loans.use: To purchase a new sewing machine for her business.

loans.name: Munaza

texts.en: Munaza is 27-year-old married women who lives with her husband and four children in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Since 2007, her husband has been driving his own taxi, which is the only source of income for his family. However, for last two months, his old taxi has not been running due to a problem with the engine. He wants to repair it and continue his work. For that reason, Munaza has requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan for repairing the engine of her husband's taxi. This loan will not only improve the taxi's condition but will help in improving her family income as well.

loans.use: To repair the engine of her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Amina Groupe

texts.fr: La cliente Kitenge est la présidente du groupe de crédit Amina, entrepreneur actif, âgée de 40 ans, mariée et mère de 6 enfants. Son époux est un nutritionniste. La cliente est vendeuse de denrées alimentaires à son  domicile. Elle commença cette initiative avec le crédit de l’IMF Hekima. Elle vient de réaliser 7 cycles dans le programme de microcrédit. La cliente évoque certains défis liés à son entreprise, notamment la vente à crédit, la perte de change car elle vente à monnaie nationale, alors qu’elle s’approvisionne au taux tarifaire de la devise (dollars). En plus, l’insécurité des groupes armés dans les zones rurales. Ce nouveau crédit lui servira d’acheter 2 sacs de farine de manioc. En dépit de tout, elle est confortable, car ce crédit lui permet de gagner sa vie et celle de sa famille. Ainsi  elle remercie Hekima et ses partenaires pour leur soutien aux pauvres femmes non bancables par le système financier classique.
texts.en:
Kitenge is the president of the borrowing group Amina. She is an active entrepreneur, 40 years old, married and the mother of 6 children. Her husband is a nutritionist. Kitenge sells food from her home. She began this business with a loan from IMF Hekima; she has completed 7 loan cycles with their microfinancing program.

Kitenge faces many challenges to her business, especially in credit selling, such as facing a loss from currency exchange since she conducts her business in the national currency, but purchases her stock in the currency of the tariff rates (dollars). Additionally, there is instability due to the armed groups in the more rural areas.

This new loan will allow Kitenge to purchase two bags of manioc (cassava) flour. In spite of everything, she leads a comfortable life, because the loans she receives allow her to make a living and support her family. She therefore thanks Hekima and its partners for their support of poor women excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to buy two bags of manioc (cassava) flour

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Oswaldo Rafael

texts.es:
Oswaldo de 38 años de edad, originario de Masaya, casado, tiene 2 hijos entre las edades de 8-12  años respectivamente, el es comerciante se dedica a vender carbón y  ropa usada desde hace 3 años, inicio su negocio vendiendo verduras pero le resultaba poco rentable por que  perdía bastante producto, entonces decidió cambiar el giro de su negocio y actualmente se dedica  a la venta de carbón y ropa productos que tienen mas durabilidad, este nuevo  negocio le ha abierto puertas ya que su nivel de vida ha cambiado  y su negocio  hasta hoy es estable. En este negocio recibe el apoyo de su familia, Oswaldo comercializa su producto en un mercado capitalino, a el  le gustaría obtener otro local  en el mismo sector  y dar a conocer su producto. Quiere mejorar  las condiciones del negocio para que de buen aspecto a los clientes y esto traerá consigo más ganancias y mejorara su nivel de vida y el de su familia.
El ha solicitado este crédito para comprar  carbón, ropa usada.  Una de sus metas próximas es mejorar su vivienda y comprar un nuevo tramo para separar el negocio de la ropa del carbón ya que los comercializa en un mismo local y le gustaría tener un local independiente para cada uno.
texts.en:
Oswaldo, 38, is from Masaya.  He’s married and has two children whose ages are 8 and 12 years respectively.  He’s a merchant.  He’s been selling charcoal and used clothes for three years.  

He started his business selling vegetables but it wasn’t very profitable because quite a bit of the products spoiled.  He decided to change his line of work and he currently sells charcoal and clothes which are more durable products.  

This new business has opened doors and his standard of living is changing and his business is stable to date.  His family helps him with the business.  

Oswaldo sells his products in a market in the capital.  He’d like to obtain another locale in the same sector to make his products known.  He wants to improve the business’ conditions so that it will be attractive to customers which will lead to higher profits and will improve his and his family’s standard of living.

He has requested this loan to buy charcoal and used clothes.  One of his next goals is to make some home improvements and to buy a new market space to separate the charcoal sales from the clothing sales since he currently sells both in the same space and he’s like to make each one independent from the other.

loans.use: to buy charcoal and used clothes.

loans.name: Junita

texts.en: Junita is 32 years old and she is married.  She has two children and her husband is a farmer. She is requesting a $ 1000 loan and she will use the loan to buy second-hand clothes to sell. She has been selling second-hand clothes since 2009 with a working capital of $90 and before that, she was selling cigarettes only. She lives together with her parents and she hopes that with the income from her business she will be able to build a house for her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en: Veronica is 21 years old and she is married. She is taking a loan to buy second-hand clothes; she is earning a good income from her business. Her husband is a laborer and he is very helpful. She started this business in 2010 with her own working capital of $500. She lives in a simple house made of palm branches and zinc. She wants to build a good house in the future.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes.

loans.name: Cornelia

texts.en: Cornelia is 32 years old and she is getting married to a policeman. She has six children, and four of them are  in school. She has a kiosk and she will buy some additional supplies with the loan including sugar, coffee and rice. She opened her kiosk in 2002. She started with a working capital of $1000. She lives in a house with five rooms and the house is made of bricks and zinc. She wants her children to get a good education.

loans.use: to buy sugar, coffee and rice.

loans.name: Muslimakhon

texts.ru: Муслимахону 38 лет. Она очень добрая, трудолюбивая женщина и работает в больнице. 6 лет назад она развелась с мужем. Муслимахон воспитывает сына одна и старается обеспечить его со всеми необходимыми средствами. Ее сын окончил школу и поступил в университет. Муслимахон хочет, чтобы ее сын стал хорошим специалистом и всегда был ее опорой. Муслимахон запрашивает кредит на сумму 1000 долларов США для оплаты учебы своего сына. Давайте вместе поможем Муслимахону сделать ее сына хорошего специалиста!
texts.en: Muslimakhon is 38 years old.  She is a very kind and hardworking woman, who works at a hospital.  She divorced her husband six years ago.  Muslimakhon is raising a son by herself and tries to provide him with all of the necessary means.  Her son completed school and was accepted to a university.  Muslimakhon wants her son to become a good speciality and always be her support.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of $1000 to pay for her son's education.  Let's help Muslimakhon together to make her son a good specialist!

loans.use: to pay for her son's education

loans.name: Mahmarajab

texts.ru:
Махмарачаб житель района Кумсангир. Ему 44 года. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Махмарачаб уже год как занимается скотоводством. Он в основном разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи.
Махмарачаб просит кредит для закупа дойной коровы, чтобы увеличить поголовья скота и обеспечить семью молоком.
texts.en: Mahmarajab is a resident of the Qumsangir district.  He is 44 years old, married and has seven children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Mahmarajab has been involved in animal husbandry for one year.  He primarily breeds cattle for future sale.  Mahmarajab is requesting this loan to buy a dairy cow in order to increase livestock headcount and provide his family with milk.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to increase livestock headcount and provide his family with milk

loans.name: Trinite De Bedou 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 & 6 Group

texts.fr:
Yvrose est le coordinatrice de son groupe Trinite de Bedou. Elle n'est pas mariee elle a un enfant. Elle habite dans la région de Bedou d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité

Yvrose a dirigé son commerce de produit  alimentaire  pendant les 3 dernières  années. Egalement elle  voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir  dans son commerce. Elle  espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business

Les  autres membres de ce meme groupe ont besoin d’un emprunt pour les commerces  tels que charbon, vètement usage, ect. Yvrose dit  que son but principale  c´est d'avoir  entreprise florissante.
texts.en:
Yvrose is the coordinator of her group, Trinite de Bedou. She is single, without children. She lives in the Bedou region of Haiti, where electricity is rare and access to water is very limited.

Yvrose has been running her food business for three years. She would like to use this loan it invest in her business. She hopes that this loan will allow her to expand her activities.

The other members of her group need a loan to restock such items for sale as charcoal, used clothing, etc. Yvrose says that her main goal is to have a successful business.

loans.use: to stock up on food [for resale].

loans.name: Wendlabangre Group

texts.fr:
Mme ZOENABO est la représentante du groupe WENDLABANGRE.  ZOENABO se porte bien. Sur la photo celle qui est sortie est en soutra noir(tenue musulmane). Elle est  mariée  et mère de 05enfants. Le plus âgé  a 28ans et  le moins âgé a 15ans. 01 va  à l’école. Elle a 05 personnes  en charge.

Elle vend des sandwichs et des bonbons depuis 22ans. Elle vend maintenant des galettes et tisse les pagnes traditionnels car elle vendait avec les élèves qui sont actuellement en vacance. Elle s’approvisionne à la boulangerie Wend Konta et maintenant  au marché de Pissy  pour les galettes en ville. Ses clients sont  les élèves car elle vend dans les écoles et maintenant ses voisins et amis. Son prêt passé s’est bien dérouler, elle est contente et rend grâce à Dieu.

Elle veut  s’acheter 01 bidon d’huile de 20l, 01sac de sucre et 01 sac de petit mil pour la préparation des galettes.

 Mme  avec ses bénéfices veut faire face à la scolarité de son enfant et s’occuper de sa famille. Elle ambitionne  agrandir son commerce et construire une maisonnette de stockage pour son commerce.
texts.en:
Zoenabo is the representative for the Wendlabangre Group. Zoenabo is doing well. In the photo she is wearing a black "soutra" (muslim clothing). She is married and the mother of 5 children from ages 15 to 28. One of Zoenabo's children attends school; she has 5 dependents. 

Zoenabo has been selling sandwiches and candy for 22 years. She now sells pastries and weaves traditional fabrics because she used to sell to students who are currently on vacation. She stocks up at the Wend Konta bakery and now also at the market in Pissy for pastries. Her customers are students, since she sells in schools, and now also her neighbors and friends.

Her previous loan went smoothly, so Zoenabo is happy and thanks God for this. She would like to buy one 20L drum of oil, one bag of sugar, and one bag of millet in order to prepare pastries. With these proceeds, Zoenabo hopes to focus on schooling her child and taking care of her family. Her goal is to grow her business and to build a small stock house for her business.

loans.use: to buy a 20L drum of oil, one bag of sugar, and one bag of millet to prepare pastries

loans.name: Siring

texts.fr: Siring est une femme mariée.Elle est mère de trois enfants.Deux de ses enfants fréquentent l'école.Elle exerce un commerce de balaies.Sa marchandise se vend bien au niveau d'une clientèle essentiellement féminine et lui rapporte des bénéfices assez consistants.Ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses propre besoins et à ceux de ses enfants.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 500 000f pour acheter un stock de 300 balaies.Son ambition est de faire des voyages de commerce dans les pays limitrophes.
texts.en:
Siring is a married woman. She is mother to three children. Two of her children go to school. She sells brooms. Her merchandise sells well to a clientèle made up essentially of women and brings in fairly consistent profits, which allows her to meet her own needs and those of her children.

In order to strengthen her business, she is requesting a loan of 500,000f to buy a stock of 300 brooms. Her goal is to go on business trips to bordering countries.

loans.use: to buy a stock of 300 brooms.

loans.name: Lorenca

texts.en: Lorenca is a 24-year-old married woman with 2 children. Her husband is a farmer. She is taking out a $600 loan to improve her business. Lorenca will use the loan to buy additional supplies for her store, including soft drinks and alcoholic drinks. She opened her kiosk 2009 with $200. She hopes that the loan will help her grow her business and increase her income to support her family.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks and alcoholic drinks

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Fatou est une commercante qui vend des habits d'enfants.Elle s'approvisionne en gros dans les grands marchés de la capitale et revend sa marchandise en détails dans sa localité.Son commerce lui rapporte des revenus assez consistants qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses propres besoins mais également à ceux de ses enfants.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter des vêtements pour enfants.
texts.en:
Fatou is a shopkeeper who sells children's clothing. She gets her supplies wholesale in the large markets of the capital and resells her merchandise retail in her locale. Her business brings in fairly consistent revenue which allows her to meet her own needs but also those of her children.

In order to strengthen her business, she is requesting a loan of 500,000f to buy children's clothing.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer for growing fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Bassyyam Group

texts.fr:
Mme AZARA  est la représentante du groupe BASSYAM. AZARA se porte bien. Celle qui ne fait plus partie du groupe est de teint clair et habillée en jaune-rouge à coté de celle en tenue bleu claire. Elle est  mariée  et mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé  a 16ans et  le moins âgé a 10ans. 03 vont à l’école. Elle a 01 personne  en charge, les autres charges sont pour son mari.
Elle vend des  pagnes et appareils de musique depuis 09ans. Elle s’approvisionne  à Lomé et au Mali. Ses clients sont  les femmes et hommes. Elle Dit avoir acheter des articles de ménage tels que des serpillières, des balais, des seaux, des bassines etc. car les appareils de musique ne se vendait pas bien en cette période. Tout s’est bien passé.
Elle veut  s’acheter  100 complets de pagnes bazin.
 Avec  ses bénéfices  elle compte s’épanouir en investissant dans son foyer. AZARA dit que le crédit a multiplié son chiffre d’affaire par deux et l’a permi de prendre en charge les frais médicaux de son enfant. Pour ce nouveau prêt, elle désire ouvrir une deuxième boutique au marché de Pissy.  Elle ambitionne  agrandir son affaire et de scolariser son enfant.
texts.en:
Mrs. Azara is the representative of the group BASSYYAM. She is doing well. She is married with four children ages 10 to 16. Three of them go to school. She supports one child, and her husband supports the others.  

Mrs. Azara has been selling pagnes (colorful West-African cloth) and music instruments for 9 years. She buys her merchandise in Lomé and in Mali. Her customer base is composed of men and women. Lately, her merchandise has included household items such as floor cloths, brooms, buckets, basins, etc. as demand for music instruments has been low. Everything went well. 

She plans to buy 100 sets of Bazin pagnes. Her profits will go to her household and her family’s well-being. 

Mrs. Azara has stated that the credits obtained have helped her to double her sales and to provide for her child’s healthcare. This new loan will allow her to open a second shop at the market of Pissy. She wants to expand her business and provide for her child’s education.

Please note that the lady dressed in yellow and red, standing next to the one in light blue, is no longer a member of the group.

loans.use: to buy 100 sets of Bazin pagnes.

loans.name: Vanessa Sylvie

texts.fr: vanessa est une femme agée de 30 ans, mariée mère de 3 enfants dont l'age varie entre 05 et 15 ans, ils sont tous scolarisés. Elle a aussi une autre personne à sa charge. elle est couturière et a ouvert un atelier qu'elle gère depuios 4 ans dans un quartier de la capitale . son dynamisme, son savoir faire et sa créativité lui ont permis d'accroitre une clientèle considérable. Elle souhaiterai avoir une machine à coudre "fait tout" pour augmenter de diligence dans travail d'où la necessité de ce crédit pour activité parce que son capital de lui permet pas de s'en procurer. ceci lui permettra de satisfaire la demande et augmenter sa marge bénéficiare. les bénéfices issus de ce crédit seront réinvestis dans son activté pour l'agrandir.
texts.en:
Vanessa is a 30 year old woman, married mother to 3 children whose age varies between 5 and 15 years, and they are all in school. She also has another dependent. She is a seamstress and opened a workshop that she has been managing for 4 years in a neighborhood of the capital. Her dynamism, her know-how and her creativity have allowed her to grow a considerable clientèle.

She would like to have a sewing machine that "does everything" to increase the diligence in the work thus the necessity of this business loan because her capital does not allow her to buy one. This will allow her to satisfy the demand and increase her profit margin. The profits resulting from this loan will be reinvested in her business to expand it.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine that "does everything".

loans.name: Etelvina

texts.en:
Etelvina is a 31-year-old married woman with four children. Her older child is in school and her husband is a farmer. 

Etelvina has a kiosk in front of her home to supply people in her village with basic goods. She will purchase additional supplies for her store with the loan, including flour, oil, soap, and vegetables. 

She opened her kiosk in 2009 and she started with her own working capital of $100. She wants to make her kiosk bigger in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies for her store, including flour, oil, soap, and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing and lace for her boutique business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy additional mobile phones and accessories to sell.

loans.name: Pablo Enrique

texts.es: Pablo es habitante de la comarca Las canoas, Teustepe casado, se dedica a la venta de  lapiceros, ropa interior, etc. Paulo dice que se inició en el negocio hace 20 años vendiendo jabón hecho de cebo, posteriormente lapiceros y otros productos cuyo negocio era de un hermano de el, con los años fue ahorrando dinero .Hoy día tiene 8 años de tener su propio negocio de ropa interior entre otros productos  comercializa sus productos de manera ambulante en otros pueblos dirigiéndose a las  pulperías. Paulo  está solicitando este crédito para ampliar más su negocio agregando a su inventario más ropa interior tanto masculina como femenina lo que le permitirá tener mayor surtido y ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes permitiéndole obtener mejorar sus ingresos . Pues su meta es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia ,hacer de su negocio algo más sostenible economicamente.
texts.en:
Pablo lives in Las Canoas, Teustepe, is married, and sells crayons, underwear, etc. Paulo says he started his business 20 years ago selling soap made of tallow, then crayons and other items. He and his brother were in business together, and over the years they saved money. Eight years ago, he began his own business selling underwear and other merchandise as a street vendor to small stores in other communities.

Paulo is requesting this loan to expand his business by purchasing more men's and women's underwear for inventory. He will have more stock and variety to offer his customers, which will increase his income. His goal is to improve his family's situation and make his business more stable.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Musharaf

texts.en: Musharaf is 45 years old and married. She has three children. Their ages  range from 18 to 23 years. She sells dried fruits to earn a living. She has been in business for four years. Through the financial support from Imon International, she has managed to grow her business. She dreams of expanding her business and becoming prosperous in the future. She needs a loan of $3000 to buy dried fruits for increasing the variety she offers. She will look for your help.

loans.use: To buy dried fruits for increasing the variety she offers

loans.name: Violeta

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de comestibles,la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y galletas,la socia trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia tambien sigue trabajando en una empresa de transportes,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de comestibles.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues to manage a grocery store where she sells basic necessity products such as rice, sugar, milk, and cookies. She works from 5:00 AM to 10:00 PM and has been in the grocery business for eight years.

The member also continues to work at a transportation company. Her dream is to expand her grocery business. She is requesting a loan in order to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies. The member is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.

loans.name: Amanbek

texts.en:
Amanbek is 25 years old and lives with his wife in Bayan-Ulgii province of Mongolia. 

Since 2007, Amanbek has operated a taxi service business between Hosh-Agach and Ulgy by a UAZ469 car. He also operates an organic vegetable trading business. He has his own land. He plants his organic vegetables by himself and sells them in the local market. He needs a loan of 6,000,000 MNT to purchase land to increase production of his organic vegetable plants. 

He is well-experienced in his business, and the local residents appreciate him as a calm and hardworking man. Now his business is sustainable and he has many regular customers. In the future, he plans to buy a mini-bus to expand his transportation service.

loans.use: To purchase land to increase production of his organic vegetable plants

loans.name: Batsuuri

texts.en:
Batsuuri is 30 years old and lives with his wife and his daughter in old small house in the Dornod province of Mongolia. His wife's name is Solongo, and she works for an NGO. His daughter's name is Bayanjargal, and she goes to the secondary school. 

In 2009, he started a transportation service business that runs between Dornod province and Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

Beginning 2011, he started to operate a recycled materials trade business. Today. Batsuuri is very experienced with the recycled materials trade business, and his customers appreciate him as a diligent and friendly man. As time passes his business expanding, so he needs 2,500,000 MNT to enlarge his truck to carry recycled materials to the trade center. Batsuuri expects a major improvement in his family's living situation.

loans.use: To enlarge his truck to carry recycled materials to the trade center.

loans.name: Wilmer Ricardo

texts.es:
WILMER RICARDO tiene 29 años de estado civil Union Libre vive con la compañera y con los hijos. Viven en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

 WILMER RICARDO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz, arroz, fréjol, además se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y pollos. Las compras y ventas de los productos lo hace en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para poder comprar lo necesario para los cultivos. El sueño es comprar una finca.

En los tiempos libres le gusta mucho hacer deporte en especial el indor.
texts.en:
Wilmer Ricardo is 29 years old.  He is in a common-law relationship and lives with his partner and children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos province. 
The “14 de Diciembre” Communal Bank is comprised of fifteen members of the San José cooperative, located in the “San Vicente de Las Lomas” precinct belonging to the Ventanas Canton.  The inhabitants are engaged in agricultural activities such as planting corn. Wilmer Ricardo is engaged in farming. He plants corn, rice, and beans and also raises pigs and chickens.  He buys and sells his products in Ventanas.  He is requesting the loan to buy organic fertilizer, urea, and liquid fertilizers for corn planting.  The loan will help him buy what he needs for his crops.  His dream is to buy a farm.  In his spare time, he enjoys playing sports, especially indoor sports.  
.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer, urea, and liquid fertilizers.

loans.name: Nolberto Benito

texts.es:
NOLBERTO BENITO tiene 59 años de estado civil Soltero vive con un sobrino no tiene hijos. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

NOLBERTO BENITO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar y en las ferias de los alrededores.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudará ha obtener ingresos con la cosecha de las siembras. El sueño es tener una casa y tener un sistema de riego.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte en especial el indor.
texts.en:
Nolberto Benito is 59, single, lives with his nephew, and has no children. He lives in Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province. The communal bank "14 de diciembre" comprises 15 members belonging to the San José cooperative located in San Vicente de las Lomas in Ventanas canton. The members do farmwork such as planting corn.

Nolberto Benito plants corn. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products in the market there or at nearby fairs. He is requesting this loan to buy seed, urea, and liquid fertilizers to plant corn. The loan will help him earn income after harvesting his crops. He dreams of having his own house and an irrigation system. In his free time, he likes to play indoor sports.

loans.use: to buy seed, urea, and liquid fertilizers to plant corn.

loans.name: Gochoohuu

texts.en: Gochoohuu is 61 years old and lives with his wife in a small house in Songinohairhan district, Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife, Purewsuren, is 60 years old. Gochoohuu managed stock raising from 1975 to 2005. In 2006 he started a cow farm business with his wife. He has 25 cows. He hires workers. Now, his business is going successfully. He supplies organic milk to a milk production company in Ulaanbaatar. He is a  hardworking and quiet-natured man. He needs 6,500,000 MNT to purchase forage for his cattle, repair his barn and pay the salary for his employees.

loans.use: To purchase forage for his cattle, repair his barn and pay the salary for his employees

loans.name: Domitila

texts.es: Domitila tiene 57 años de edad, es soltera por viudez, vive en el municipio de Morazan Yoro, junto a sus dos hijos. Ella se dedica a vender ropa nueva y usada de manera ambulante, entrega a domicilio y por encargo desde hace 3 años realiza esta actividad. Vende blusas, pantalones, camisas, ropa interior y lo que le pidan sus clientes. Adicionalmente elabora comida para vender y realiza trabajos de costura de prendas de vestir lo que le genera otros ingresos.  Y para mantenerlo estable ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 6,000 Lempiras para comprar más ropa variada para vender e incrementar sus ingresos, ya que su meta es darles el estudio a sus hijos y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia
texts.en:
Domitila, age 57, is single as a result of becoming a widow. She lives in the town of Morazan Yoro with her two children. Domitila sells new and used clothing as a traveling merchant. She takes orders and makes deliveries from her home and has now been in operation for three years. Domitila sells blouses, trousers, shirts, and undergarments that are requested by her customers. In addition, she prepares food to sell and sews articles of clothing in order to generate extra income.

To maintain stability, Domitila has decided to request a loan of 6,000 HNL in order to buy more clothing in variety that she can sell so that she can increase her earnings. Her goal is to provide an education for her children and to improve the living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy new and used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Julia Del Socorro

texts.es: Julia del Socorro de 50 años de edad, es madre soltera con tres hijos de 20, 24 26 años todos trabajan, y se desempeña como operaria de limpieza en el hospital de su localidad. Julia está solicitando el financiamiento para cambiar su techo de la sala y repellar y embaldosar un cuarto, mejoras que no las habían podido realizado por falta de recursos económicos porque su salario no le  permite hacer la inversión. Con el financiamiento comprar matrería de construcción como: zinc para el techo, perlines, cemento, y otros materiales. Y  para Julia es su primer crédito. Y su sueño es en un futuro es terminar de remodelar su casita.
texts.en: Julia del Socorro, 50, is a single mother whose three children, ages 20, 24, and 26, are all working. She is a cleaning woman is a local hospital. Julia is requesting financing to replace the living room roof and replaster and tile a room. She has not been able to make these improvements because she lacked the necessary funds, as her salary doesn't leave her money to invest. With the loan, she will buy construction materials such as zinc for the roof, beams, cement, and other materials. This is Julia's first loan cycle. She dreams of finishing the improvements to her little house.

loans.use: to make home improvements such as replacing the living room roof and replastering and tiling a room.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy fresh seasonal vegetables for vegetable-selling business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy embroidery supplies for her business.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda tiene  25 años de edad,  vive en unión de hecho con su pareja tiene dos hijos quienes tienen tres  y seis años de edad,respectivamente, el mayor es estudiante viven en Sololá, cultiva verduras como zanahoria, papa y maíz para después  cosecharlos y comercializarlos en el lugar de su residencia , lo realiza  desde hace 6 años porque son los que mantienen mejores precios en el mercado, quiere seguir cultivando estas verduras en mas lugares así  obtener mejores ganancias, por la cual ella solicita un crédito de Q 6,500.00 quetzales para comprar más semillas e insumos  luego poder cultivar,  sueña con tener una vivienda mejorada  y poder darles mejores estudios académicos a sus hijos en un futuro.
texts.en:
Yolanda, age 25, is in a common-law marriage.  She has two children, ages three and six.  The oldest goes to school.  They live in Sololá.

She grows vegetables like carrots, potatoes, and corn.  She later harvests them and sells them in the area where she lives.  She has been doing this for six years, because these are the crops that have the best prices in the market.

She wants to continue growing these vegetables in more places in order to get greater income.  In order to do so she is requesting a loan for 6,500 Guatemalan quetzal to buy more seeds and supplies to be used later for planting.

She dreams of having a better house and of being able to give her children an academic education in the future.

loans.use: to buy potato and carrot seeds.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es: Doña María de Jesús,  tiene 52 años de edad, está soltera, tiene 5 hijos, vive en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida junto a dos hijos menores quienes están estudiando. Hace 5 años que ella se dedico a vender productos AVON y SELSA mediante catálogos, vende perfumes, lociones, cosméticos, cremas y otros, estos los vende a través de catalogo por pedidos y entrega a domicilio. Con el préstamo que solicita de 8,000 lempiras va comprar más productos de cosméticos, cremas perfumes etc. para cumplir con los pedidos pendientes de entrega. Es el tercer préstamo que va invertir en su negocio y lo ha mantenido estable, tiene buena clientela. Su meta es seguir trabajando para seguir apoyando a sus dos hijos menores con el estudio y que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
María de Jesús, age 52, is single and has five children.  She lives in the Tela municipality in Atlántida with her two minor children, who go to school.

She has been selling Avon and Selsa products through catalogs for five years.  She sells perfumes, lotions, cosmetics, creams, and others.  She sells these through catalog orders, and she delivers to homes.  

She will use the requested loan for 8,000 lempiras to buy more cosmetic products, creams, and perfumers, etc.  She will do this in order to fill pending orders for delivery.  This is the third loan that she will invest in her business, and this has kept the business stable with good clientele.

Her goal is to continue working in order to continue supporting her two minor children’s education and for her business to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy Avon and Selsa perfumes, cosmetics, creams, and lotions, etc.in order to stock her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy animal feed for resale.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 46-year-old man, he is married and a father to six children.

Ahmad owns a barber shop in the old city of Bethlehem. He started this business when he was 18 years old, as he likes hairstyles. He took several training sessions to be a professional. 
Ahamad requested from FATEN a 3,000 USD loan to renovate his shop and update the decor in order to attract more customers. He will also use the loan to buy new products for hair and skin treatments. Ahmad appears in the picture at the entrance to his shop.

loans.use: To renovate his shop and to buy new products

loans.name: Muhabat

texts.ru: Мухабат проживает в районе Колхозобод, недалеко от города Кургантюбе. Она вдова. Ей 49 лет. Ее сын находится на заработках за границей. Мухабат имеет среднее образование. Она занимается торговлей на рынке города Кургантюбе. Мухабат более двадцати лет занимается торговлей овощей. Она берет кредит для покупки помидоров, огурцов, баклажанов, перцев, капусты и тыквы.
texts.en:
Muhabat is a 49-year-old widow living in the Kolhozavod region, not far from the city of Qurgan-Tube. She has a high school education, and her son works abroad. 

Muhabat is a seller at the market in Qurgan-Tube, and has worked in the vegetable trade for more than 20 years. She would like to get this loan in order to purchase tomatoes, cucumbers, eggplants, peppers, cabbage, and pumpkins.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, cucumbers, eggplants, peppers, cabbage, and pumpkins

loans.name: Ramiz

texts.en:
Ramiz is a 34-year-old man, married with two children. He is IDP (an internally displaced person) and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement.   

He raises cows and cattle and sells milk and milk products as well as cattle for meat purposes to local butchers. Ramiz has 10 years of experience in this field, thanks to his father, who taught him how to look after cattle. He receives 80 AZN financial support from the government monthly, but this is too low to cover his family's needs.

Ramiz usually buys small cattle, raises and fattens them in five or six months, and resells them for a more profitable price in the local livestock bazaar.  Milk and yoghurt he sells to the neighbors. Milk and meat selling brings 150 AZN income per month. 

Milk and yoghurt, as well as meat is very popular product in Azerbaijan. People use meat in everyday national dishes as pilau and dolma and always use yoghurt sauce. Milk products are considered very healthful and also present in everyday life.   

Ramiz applied for 600 AZN to purchase one milk cow.

loans.use: to buy one milk cow.

loans.name: Trinidad Teresa

texts.es:
Trinidad Teresa tiene 50 años de edad de estado civil actual soltera tiene cuatro hijos, vive con la familia y con los hijos en el Cantón ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Trinidad Teresa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandu, además se dedica a la cría de cerdos y pollos. Las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. 

Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, líquido mata maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos. El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá comprar los abonos, semillas sin ningún tipo de problema.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas cómo el cogollero que dañan los cultivos. El sueño es poder  comprar máquinaria agrícola. En el tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Trinidad Teresa is 50 years old. Her current civil status is single. She has four children and lives with her family and her children in Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province. 

The Dulce Sentimiento ("Sweet Sentiment") communal bank is located in Caimito II precinct, which is in Puerto Pechiche parish in Pueblo Viejo canton. This communal bank works in short-cycle agriculture growing corn, rice, and pigeon peas. 

Trinidad Teresa works in agriculture growing corn, rice, and pigeon peas. She also raises pigs and chickens. She buys and sells in Ventanas canton.

She is asking for the loan in order to buy seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed killer to maintain her crops in good condition. The loan will be of great help because she will be able to buy fertilizer and seeds without any problem.

The challenges she faces are the infestations, such as the army worm, that damage the crops. Her dream is to be able to buy agricultural machinery. In her free time, she likes to listen to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, herbicide, fertilizer, and weed-killer

loans.name: Mahammad

texts.en:
Mahammad is 59 years old. He is married and has 3 children. 14 years ago he started an agriculture business to multiply cows. Now he needs 1,500 AZN to buy some new calves to improve his business. Mahammad love his work. It was his second loan. The first time his loan was $1,200 and he is very thankful to Kiva and lenders for the loan.

Mahammad is an Internally Displaced Person (IDP) from Fuzuli town, but now he is settled in the Fuzuli region with his family.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Nune

texts.en: Nune lives in Nalbandyan village in the Armavir region with her husband, father in-law and 2 children: 21-year-old daughter and 17-year-old son. The family earns its main income from agriculture. On the family farm they raise cows, hens and pigs, cultivate wheat, watermelons, and grow fruit trees: apricot, peach, cherry, plum and grape. To cover all costs for such a big farm, Nune needs sufficient funds. In particular, she wants to purchase grass to feed the cattle, fertilzer for the land cultivation, as well as hire workers for the land cultivation and pay for flouring the wheat. Implementation of these goals will allow Nune to gather stable income and make savings to invest in the development of the farm next year.

loans.use: buy cattle feed, fertilzer and pay for labor

loans.name: Yuky Group

texts.es:
El comité Yuky esta compuesta por 16 integrantes mujeres que se dedican a actividades varias, desde vendedoras hasta peluqueras que se complementan para hacer un comité muy unido.Las señoras son excelentes vendedoras cada quien en su negocio, son muy persistentes con sus metas, son gente trabajadora que  con mucho esfuerzo y dedicacion mejoran la calidad sus vidas.
La señora Felicia se dedica a la venta de ropas para toda la familia, tiene para los niños, mujeres, hombres por eso tiene un gran número de clientes fieles que saben de la calidad y buen precio que ofrece la señora Felicia. 
Ella solicita el crédito para aumentar la cantidad de mercaderías ya que tiene una gran demanda y con esos ingresos la señora lo utilizaría para pagar sus gastos y poder re invertir en el negocio.
texts.en:
The Yuky Group is made up of 16 members, women who work in various trades - from sales people to hairdressers - who complement each other and form a united group. 

The women are excellent sales people, each of them is very dedicated to reaching their business goals and they are hard working people who are improving their quality of life with lots of hard work and dedication.
